title: 关于GroupManager插件到底怎么设置？
txt_content:
RT，在/plugins/GroupManager/worlds/world/group.yml是组的文件吗？
它的内容是：

# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - MyPet.user.capturehelper
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -vanish.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&4'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - residence.create
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''


比如说，我想让所有玩家都有mypet插件的权限MyPet.user.capturehelper，应该怎么写？
还有我想新建一个组，让这个组有普通的权限并且有其他权限，这在原本的文件里要添加什么？还有怎么把人拉到这个组里？
本人金粒不多，希望大神们帮帮忙

replies.author: 孤山冷月
replies.txt_content:
groups:
  组名字:
    default: false#是否默认玩家为该组
    permissions:#权限 参见插件权限文件
    - MyPet.user.capturehelper
    inheritance:#权限 详见\plugins\GroupManager\globalgroups.yml 
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:#这个不用说明了吧！
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''复制代码

replies.author: Jovel
replies.txt_content:
# Group inheritance # # Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups # and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml. # # Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world # and are defined in the this groups.yml file. # # Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote' groups:   Default:   //这里是权限组名称     default: false  //是不是默认玩家权限组（想要成为默认直接改TRUE）     permissions:    /./Default权限组所有的权限，比如你的MYPET权限直接粘贴到这里     - -bukkit.command.kill       - MyPet.user.capturehelper     inheritance:     - g:groupmanager_default     - g:bukkit_default     - g:essentials_default     - g:towny_default     info:     //权限组的后缀和前缀设置       prefix: '&e'       build: false       suffix: ''   Owner:     default: false     permissions:     - -vanish.*     - '*'     inheritance:     - admin     info:       prefix: '&4'       build: true       suffix: ''   Builder:     default: true     permissions:     - residence.create     inheritance:     - default     - g:essentials_builder     - g:towny_builder     info:       prefix: '&2'       build: true       suffix: ''   Moderator:     default: false     permissions: []     inheritance:     - builder     - g:groupmanager_moderator     - g:bukkit_moderator     - g:essentials_moderator     - g:towny_moderator     - g:vanish_moderator     info:       prefix: '&5'       build: true       suffix: ''   Admin:     default: false     permissions: []     inheritance:     - moderator     - g:groupmanager_admin     - g:bukkit_admin     - g:essentials_admin     - g:towny_admin     - g:vanish_admin     info:       prefix: '&c'       build: true       suffix: ''
复制代码纯手打的哦！望采纳
